name: Splatter
summary: You’re standing alone amongst the inhabitants of a modern city which suddenly took a turn for the apocalypse. Play an intriguing story line, upgrade your weapons, fight bosses, drive vehicles, meet other characters, and use light to survive. Humanity isn’t exactly worth saving, but you might end up doing it anyways.
